local_intent: Lift the grasped white plate by 0.1 m along +Z to begin transfer, verifying it remains held.
assumptions: TCP is aligned; small clearance lift before traverse
coherence_with_global: Matches GLOBAL_BT segment: after <IsGraspStable/>, execute <MoveDelta axis="z" dist="0.1" timeout_ms="800"/>; added post-check <ObjectInGripper target="white_plate"/> to verify retention before transfer.
